mapper.select: select t.id,t.parentId,t.rate,t.getMoreId,g.userName,t.name,t.sex,t.phone,t.job,t.type,t.introImg ,t.createDate,t.status,t.isCompany,t.code,t.unpay,t.totalPay, t.description,t.updateDate,t.updateUserId ,tc.name parentName,tc.status parentStatus from third_channel t left join getmore_user g on g.getMoreId=t.getMoreId left join third_channel tc on tc.id=t.parentId where t.id=#{id}

select t.id,tc.id parentId,t.rate,t.getMoreId,g.userName,t.name,t.sex,t.phone,t.job,t.type,t.introImg ,t.createDate,t.status,t.isCompany,t.code,t.unpay,t.totalPay, t.description,t.updateDate,t.updateUserId ,tc.name parentName,tc.status parentStatus from third_channel t left join getmore_user g on g.getMoreId=t.getMoreId left join third_channel tc on tc.id=t.parentId where t.getMoreId=#{getMoreId} and t.isCompany=0

select wu.getMoreId,wu.nickname,wu.headimgurl,count(fo.orderId) count from getmore_user gu left join third_channel tc on gu.code=tc.code left join wechat_user wu on wu.getMoreId=gu.getMoreId left join fur_order fo on fo.getMoreId=wu.getMoreId where tc.id=#{channelId} GROUP by wu.getMoreId,wu.nickname,wu.headimgurl order by wu.getMoreId
select count(*) from getmore_user gu left join third_channel tc on gu.code=tc.code where tc.id=#{channelId}
